divs: Sighting DetailsWELL..>>... I Was Sitting At Home At The Time When My Girlfriend Just Came Back From The Store & Said :-->> "" Hey Honey Grab Your Camara & You've Gotta See This "" So , As I Did Grab My Camara & Went Out Side My Front Door Up In The Sky Looking Due North East I Saw This VERY BRIGHT ROUND LOOKING OBJECT In The Sky & Took My First Still Photograph Picture Of It But There Was A Tree In The Way & So, I Went Onto My Back Patio Too Take The Remainder Of My 4 Shots That I Did Take Of This Object, At The Time It Did'nt Seem To Be Moving At All & Its BRIGHT TWINKLING LIGHT That Elluminated From It Was Really Kool. Then I Went Inside My House Too Tell My Buddy About It & My Girlfriend Too & By Aprox. 4 To 5 Mins & It Was NO LONGRER Anywhere Too Be Seen.
